data.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me on digital and stream instantly or download offline. In the biggest Austin Powers adventure yet, the International Man of Mystery must travel back to the Swinging Sixties, track down his stolen mojo and thwart Dr. Evil's plot to destroy the world. Of course, along the way, Austin meets his match in CIA operative Felicity Shagwell, a fab chick, hot spy and fantastic motivation for restoring his libido.
data.text:
...an often relentlessly hit-and-miss sequel that rarely, if ever, achieves the highs of its near-flawless predecessor...

December 1, 2022

The sexual innuendo is back and still largely effective, but the repetitiousness of jokes from the first film start to lose their hilarity.

September 9, 2020

The Spy Who Shagged Me is a funny film, but often elicited little more than chuckles out of me.

September 2, 2020

The film opened with a Star Wars-styled text scrolling, about how Austin Powers was frozen in 1967 and defrosted in the 90s to battle his nemesis Dr. Evil. After succeeding and banishing Evil, Powers settled down with his newly-wed wife Vanessa...

September 27, 2019

...doesn't so much try to send up other spy films as it tries to one-up its own predecessor in this second go-round.

June 21, 2017
